actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide additional respite care for spouses of members of the Armed Forces who deploy overseas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Military Child Care Act of 2008 - Directs the Secretary of Defense to issue guidance to ensure access to, and affordability of, respite care with respect to children under the age of 13 for: (1) spouses of members of the Armed Forces deployed to a combat zone, and for caregivers with respect to such members; and (2) survivors of members who are killed during such deployment.

titles.title: A bill to provide additional respite care for spouses of members of the Armed Forces who deploy overseas, and for other purposes.
